skills.name: Time Thence Blurs
skills.desc: Deals Ice DMG equal to #1[i]% of Evernight's Max HP to one designated enemy.
skills.simpleDesc: Deals minor Ice DMG to one designated enemy.

skills.name: Day Gently Slips
skills.desc: Consumes #6[i]% of Evernight's current HP to summon memosprite Evey and increases CRIT DMG of all ally memosprites by an amount equal to #1[i]% of Evernight's CRIT DMG for #2[i] turn(s). This duration decreases by 1 at the start of Evernight's every turn. If Evey is already on the field, restores its HP by #4[i]% of its Max HP. When using this, gains #3[i] point(s) of "Memoria." If in the "Darkest Riddle" state, gains #5[i] additional point(s) of "Memoria."
skills.simpleDesc: Consumes this unit's HP to summon memosprite Evey and increase CRIT DMG for all ally memosprites. If Evey is already on the field, restores its HP. When using this, gains #3[i] "Memoria." If in the "Darkest Riddle" state, additionally gains #5[i] "Memoria."

skills.name: O Wakeful World, Goodnight
skills.desc: Summons memosprite Evey. Then Evey deals Ice DMG to all enemies equal to #1[i]% of Evey's Max HP and Evernight enters the "Darkest Riddle" state. During this state, all enemies take #4[i]% increased DMG while both Evernight and Evey deal #3[i]% increased DMG and are immune to Crowd Control debuffs. Gains #2[i] point(s) of Charge for "Darkest Riddle." And Evey consumes 1 point after it uses "Dream, Dissolving, as Dew." At the start of Evernight's turn, if no Charge remains, exits the "Darkest Riddle" state.
skills.simpleDesc: Deals Ice DMG to all enemies. Summons memosprite Evey and causes Evernight to enter the "Darkest Riddle" state, during which enemies take increased DMG and both Evernight and her memosprite deal increased DMG and are immune to Crowd Control debuffs.

skills.name: With Me, This Night
skills.desc:
When entering combat, summons memosprite Evey. Evey has an initial SPD of #4[i] and its Max HP equals to #5[i]% of that of Evernight's. Each time Evernight or Evey loses HP, increases CRIT DMG for Evernight and Evey by #2[i]% for #3[i] turn(s), and gains #1[i] "Memoria." This effect can trigger only once per target for each received attack.
When Evernight has #6[i] or more points of "Memoria," dispels Crowd Control debuffs and becomes immune to them. If Evey is on the field, it immediately takes action. The immediate action effect can only trigger again after Evey uses "Dream, Dissolving, as Dew."
skills.simpleDesc:
When entering combat, summons memosprite Evey. Each time this unit or Evey loses HP, increases CRIT DMG for this unit and Evey, and gains "Memoria."
When Evernight has #6[i] or more "Memoria," Evey immediately takes action.

skills.name: Let it Rain Cold On Thee
skills.desc: After using Technique, at the start of the next battle, obtains the same effect as the one from Skill that increases CRIT DMG for all ally memosprites, and gains #1[i] "Memoria."
skills.simpleDesc: At the start of the next battle, obtains the same effect as the one from Skill that increases memosprite CRIT DMG, and additionally gains "Memoria."

eidolons.name: Sleep Tight, the Night Dreams Long
eidolons.desc: When Evernight is on the field, if there are (4 or more)/3/2/1 enemy targets on the field, ally memosprites deal DMG equal to <nobr>120%</nobr>/<nobr>125%</nobr>/<nobr>130%</nobr>/<nobr>150%</nobr> of their original DMG respectively.

eidolons.name: Listen Up, the Slumber Speaks Soft
eidolons.desc: Increases Evernight's and the memosprite Evey's CRIT DMG by <nobr>40%</nobr>. Each time Evernight gains "Memoria," increases the amount of "Memoria" gain by <nobr>2</nobr> point(s). When using Ultimate, additionally gains <nobr>2</nobr> Charge for "Darkest Riddle."

eidolons.name: Fear Not, the Nightmare Lies Past
eidolons.desc:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <nobr>15</nobr>.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. <nobr>10</nobr>.
Memosprite Talent Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. <nobr>10</nobr>.

eidolons.name: Wake Up, the Tomorrow is Yours
eidolons.desc: While Evernight is on the field, ally memosprites' Weakness Break Efficiency increases by <nobr>25%</nobr>, and the memosprite Evey's Weakness Break Efficiency additionally increases by <nobr>25%</nobr>.

eidolons.name: Let Go, the "Me" in Memories
eidolons.desc:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <nobr>15</nobr>.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <nobr>15</nobr>.
Memosprite Skill Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. <nobr>10</nobr>.

eidolons.name: Like This, Always
eidolons.desc: While Evernight is on the field, all ally targets' All-Type <u>RES PEN</u> increases by <nobr>20%</nobr>. After the memosprite Evey uses "Dream, Dissolving, as Dew," Evernight gains <nobr>30%</nobr> of the amount of "Memoria" consumed in this attack.

embedBonusSkill.name: Dark the Night, Still the Moon
embedBonusSkill.desc: Increases Evernight's and the memosprite Evey's CRIT Rate by <nobr>35%</nobr>. When using an ability, consumes <nobr>5%</nobr> of this unit's current HP to increase CRIT DMG for both of them by <nobr>15%</nobr>, lasting for <nobr>2</nobr> turn(s). After Evey uses "Dream, Dissolving, as Dew," recovers 1 Skill Point for allies.

embedBonusSkill.name: Rouse the Flame, Lull the Light
embedBonusSkill.desc: When combat starts, Evernight regenerates <nobr>70</nobr> Energy and gains <nobr>1</nobr> "Memoria." When Evernight or an ally memosprite uses an ability, Evernight regenerates <nobr>5</nobr> Energy and gains <nobr>1</nobr> "Memoria."

embedBonusSkill.name: Kindle the Morn, Drop the Rain
embedBonusSkill.desc: When there are 1/2/3/(4 or more) Remembrance characters in the team, increases CRIT DMG for all ally memosprites by <nobr>5%</nobr>/<nobr>15%</nobr>/<nobr>50%</nobr>/<nobr>65%</nobr> respectively while Evernight's Skill lasts.
